source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Large waves with white foam crash against dark, imposing rock formations in the turquoise ocean. A flock of birds can be seen flying in formation across the bright blue sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic shot of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Large waves with white foam crash against dark, imposing rock formations in the turquoise ocean. A flock of birds can be seen flying in formation across the bright blue sky.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a small boat is visible moving along the coastline, which is not present in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic shot of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Large waves with white foam crash against dark, imposing rock formations in the turquoise ocean. A small boat is visible moving along the coastline, and a flock of birds can be seen flying in formation across the bright blue sky.
